title: Salisbury Off Road Explorer Walking and Cycle Route
description: This circular route follows a series of excellent off road tracks around Salisbury. Most of these trails are quite stony so a hybrid or mountain bike is advised. Since this route is almost entirely off road it is also suitable for walkers looking for a long distance walk.
display_address: De Vaux Place, Harnham, Salisbury, Wiltshire, England, SP1 2SJ, United Kingdom
